website_summaries.verdict: Never get caught in the dark again with this six-pack of clear, long-lasting emergency liquid candles.
pros: Liquid is contained so it won't spill
There's no harsh smells or smoke when candle is burned
Can pull the wick out a bit further for extra light
Each candle will burn for more than 100 hours
cons: Some users would have preferred glass containers over plastic, as plastic has a more limited shelf life

customer_reviews.title: OK, Not like photo.  Better deals elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: The candles I received were NOT as pictured. They are Candlelife brand, as shown here:  So since the candlelifes are more expensive that the emergency essentials as I write this, bonus!!! On to the candles: -They came unidentified in a makeshift sterno candle box (go figure). Mine DID NOT leak like many of the other reviews. -The brightness was, well, like a candle. Enough to navigate by, but not much more. -The wicks ARE adjustable, so there's that. -Have NO idea how long they are good for. I suspect quite a while. -There is NO wind shield of any type. It you want this there are other option (like sterno  These are a much better deal at $18 for 4.
customer_reviews.author: dgh1

customer_reviews.title: Nice candle with a little adjustment
customer_reviews.text: I've used two of the six that I purchased. Both had a very low wick and thus a very small flame. The flame would blow out in even the slightest breeze. It also did not give off enough usable light. I took some pliers and pulled the wick up about twice the length it was originally. The flame was fine and did not blow out any longer. I did not bother to time the length of burn but I can safely say it did not hit the 100 hour mark. I'm sure you could argue that it wouldn't hit the 100 hour mark due to lengthening the wick. No worries, they are still handy and I would probably purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: SoCal Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Bring on the Power Outages!
customer_reviews.text: I bought six of these candles after being without electricity for a week after superstorm Sandy hit, which was followed soon after by a nor easter that knocked the power back out again. The drug store candles I was using left black soot on the walls of my home! I can only imagine what my lungs looked like. They're a little pricey, but I tried one out and it worked great. Just pull up the wick a bit for a bigger flame. Don't forget to save the caps to re-seal them after you're done using them. So worth it for the peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: LAL

customer_reviews.title: Little damage, a bit worrisome.
customer_reviews.text: The order arrived on time. The product arrived mostly in tact. Two of the six candles were damaged. One had a bend bottle neck ring and the other had a tilted as if to much pressure was applied when putting it together. That same one was also dirty with the liquid on top. Maybe it leaked maybe it wasn't carefully put together. The inner box shows signed of leakage. The outer pancake syrup box didn't. All in all I'm a little worried about future leakage and durability.
customer_reviews.author: OctSoa

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared
customer_reviews.text: I recommend getting these candles before you lose power in your house. While flashlights are good they do not last for hours on end and you have to carry them everywhere you go. Conventional candles release smoke and do not last long. These candles last long and release little smoke that I can see. The only thing you need is a flashlight to find your lighter or matches to start the candles. That way you can save the flashlight batteries for going outside or other places the candle would not work.
customer_reviews.author: Donald D. Farra

customer_reviews.title: Buy these now, you won't regret it
customer_reviews.text: These are so much better than emergency candles! I have these placed strategically all over my house, in case of power outages. I just removed the labels to show a clear plastic container filled with clear fluid, but you could easily do something crafty with the outside to make them prettier. I've already lit several of them and can't tell that they've been burned for a night. Don't be left in the dark ;)
customer_reviews.author: N. Landis

customer_reviews.title: Lots of emergency candle light for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Was late due to storm I bought them for but not shippers fault my city post office isnt prepared for 15 inches of unexpected snow. Didn't wind up losing power regardless but good value for the money and they will go into the rest of the bug in kit for use in the future. I like that they are plastic over glass makes them more durable and have already recommended them to friends for emergency kits
customer_reviews.author: Darren W.

customer_reviews.title: I love these things
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought two of these for power outages. I got to put them to use during the 2017 hurricane season, so I bought a dozen more. I did not use all of the original ones. They really do last a LOoong time. I figure more is better when it comes to providing good light during emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Fit For Purpose
customer_reviews.text: The most common cause of house fires is... people using candles during a blackout. Candles are very hazardous. But these little units are ultra-safe (as safe as a flame can be), easy to use, provide stable light and can be moved without difficulty once lit. They should be part of everyone's emergency home supply kit, along with lots of water and sufficient food. One per room is sufficient to prevent people banging into furniture etc. but I wouldn't recommend trying to read by the light of these units. There's a reason people in the old days lost their sight so readily!
customer_reviews.author: Allan M. Lees

customer_reviews.title: Cannot adjust wick height- worthless
customer_reviews.text: The wick is very very short and the flame credulously low. Emits far less light than standard wax candles. After reading a reviewer who said they were able to gently pull up wick to increase flame size, i tried with pliers on all six. None would budge even a smidgen, in fact, it eventually destroyed the little wick that was available. Very very disappointing, Totally worthless. I also purchased these (BLACK MARLIN 4 x Long Burning Emergency Wax Led Unscented Candle) which have excellent flame and long life.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Keeps out the dark.
customer_reviews.text: I am a prepper at heart and I really fear being in the dark. All of us in Alabama remember the winter of 93. These things are need to have, each one burns for an extremely long time, they don't evaporate like the old oil lamps do. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the brand I ordered (two stars off)
customer_reviews.text: This may be just as good, but when I order something, I want to be sent what is pictured. What was pictured was Emergency Essentials brand. What I was sent are CandleLife brand. The products look very similar and for all I know may be identical but if you go find the Candlelife listing, right now it is $5 less than I paid and has a lower overall rating.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect when there's no power and you don't want a glass kerosine lamp or candles burning.
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is! I have a case of these in my basement for future use. I also have several of these placed strategically around my home. Bathrooms, kitchen, laundry room, bedrooms, etc.. I believe in emergencies, loss of power, whatever, that these are better than candles. No glass to shatter when the wax of a candle gets to low or too hot. These are small enough to "hide" behind things and yet still be easily accessible when needed. I really don't want to see them all the time. I just need to know they are where I want them, when I need them.
customer_reviews.author: hard to please

customer_reviews.title: No odor!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for emergencies, and we used during a blackout last weekend. I agree the flame is small - one candle does not provide enough light to read or play cards by, but it's good general lighting to keep the kids from freaking out. On the upside, there is NO ODOR. I was expecting a kerosene smell. NOTE: There is a small metal ring that floats near the wick. I realized too late that this is to keep the flame from blowing out when you walk (I used my hand). Also, that ring gets HOT so don't touch it (or try to reinsert the plastic cap) right after blowing the candle out. (Duh). :)
customer_reviews.author: Chrishna

customer_reviews.title: cannot stay lit
customer_reviews.text: It's almost impossible to keep these lit. They're easy enough to light, but because the wicks are very short, and you can't lengthen them, even the slightest breeze puts them out. So they're essentially useless. Waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: No Prepper should be w/out this product.
customer_reviews.text: No Prepper should be w/out this product. Went camping this weekend fri-sun and candle stayed lit the whole time,, Definitely a great survivalist product. The Legendary Lingo
customer_reviews.author: The Legendary Lingo

customer_reviews.title: Good product for emergency lighting needs
customer_reviews.text: Good product for emergency lighting needs. We get random power outages during the winter and didn't want to spend a fortune on batteries to power lanterns. These provide a good amount of light and last a long time. The only downside is that even with the plastic cap, the bottles and packaging were a little oily. We just made sure to wipe them off and store them sitting upright.
customer_reviews.author: M. B.

customer_reviews.title: the labels are different... hmmmm.
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure why the label is so different from the one shown on amazon. I just received this merchandise today. I will test to see if this will run for 115+ hours. I will update soon hopefully (march 19 2018). i will give 3 stars for now... once i test it i will edit this.
customer_reviews.author: njannie

customer_reviews.title: Good backup
customer_reviews.text: I bought same package of 6 a couple of years ago . Gave away most of them to friends. Needed to resupply my emergency kit
customer_reviews.author: Rick M

customer_reviews.title: Good emergency essentials
customer_reviews.text: I only gave a 4 star rating because I haven’t used these candles yet. These were recommended to have in an emergency kit. I went to an emergency preparation class and got a list of things to have. This was on the list.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie44

customer_reviews.title: A great thing for every family to have
customer_reviews.text: A great thing for every family to have. Everyone, no matter where you live, could potentially lose power for days due to any number of natural disasters or otherwise. These take up little space, last forever, and you will definitely want them around if you need them.
customer_reviews.author: Coalora

customer_reviews.title: got more than advertised
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get the product shown....however it was the same concept. I actually got a plastic container (these looked like glass, hence why I purchased this brand but that wasn't critical or even stated in the ad) with an orange label that says 110 hour. So I get 60 more hours of burn-time. Not exactly what I ordered, but not a bad replacement.
customer_reviews.author: L. McNerneyTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: Good Candle Lamps
customer_reviews.text: Look like nice candles to have during a power failure. I just had a 24 hour power failure and wish I had something like these but now I'm ready for the next one.
customer_reviews.author: redwing

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.  Leaking and probably not the genuine product.
customer_reviews.text: These arrived just thrown loose into a padded bag with no labels and leaking. The caps are loosely held on with tape that came off immediately as it lost its stickiness due to the leaking oil. I'm only giving them two stars rather than one as when I lit the candle it actually worked. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: ShaylaM

customer_reviews.title: The best candles!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly and in perfect condition. This is the only candles we trust for emergencies. We have used these over many years.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME CANDLES, MUST BUY!
customer_reviews.text: YES I REALLY DO LIKE THEM! WILL KEEP BUYING, VERY GOOD CUSTOMER SERVICE TOO.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene M. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Don’t know yet
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for emergencies and I haven’t used any of them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence Silkwood

customer_reviews.title: Haven't had a chance to use them but the Price Is Right
customer_reviews.text: This is just in case of an emergency I haven't had an emergency yet so so far they showed up on time and the price was okay
customer_reviews.author: K TAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: it can seem like it is not capable of giving much light
customer_reviews.text: You have to adjust the wick. If you don't realize that, it can seem like it is not capable of giving much light. After pulling the wick up a bit, it lights up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Miletic

customer_reviews.title: What a mess
customer_reviews.text: My candles just arrived and there is oil everywhere in the bag and box. All candles are covered in oil. There is no label what so ever so show that what I received was accurate. I am extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Silva

customer_reviews.title: easy to lite/put out
customer_reviews.text: They are EXACTLY what they are advertised as, moderate light, easy to lite/put out, reusable,easy to store, little to no smell Great little back up.
customer_reviews.author: sunnyside up

customer_reviews.title: great campsite candle
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these things last for like, forever. Awesome little candle. I keep a couple at home for emergencies, but I've been using them at the campsite as a lantern alternative.
customer_reviews.author: The Virginia Millers

customer_reviews.title: No label information
customer_reviews.text: Picture shows large labels on product with instructions, warnings, general information. Product received has label smaller than a postage stamp that is not able to be read. When product was shown to other people they were not sure what they are or proper way to use them. Unless you know about them it could led to unsafe or improper use. For this reason I will not repurchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth F Lee

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely f-ing no! Product arrived in a maple syrup box, saturated in fuel. Cand progress the wick AT ALL and the flame is no bigger than a single grain of rice. I would rather rely on a zippo and the cherry on a cigar for more light than these pieces of s-
customer_reviews.author: Reyain

customer_reviews.title: Not dead yet
customer_reviews.text: I hope I bought enough of these. Maybe I should buy more. Plastic seems durable. Liquid seems like a liquid. I hope it doesn’t combust in an emergency. Pray for me
customer_reviews.author: KaaziRecks

customer_reviews.title: Dim light
customer_reviews.text: The light these put off if you don't pull the wick out further is fairly dim. However that does allow it to last longer. I placed a couple of these on each floor of my house and have used them a couple times now during power-outages. I like knowing they are always there, and there is no dripping mess to worry about as with a candle.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Efficient candles for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Initially I bought this candles for emergency situations, but now take a couple of them with me on my camping trips. They work great and last for a while. Would definitely buy again once the old ones are used up.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for emergencies
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. They are plastic so I'm not worried about them breaking. Perfect for emergencies. No they will not light up the whole house but they are not designed for that. They are designed to give you some light for many hours.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisB

customer_reviews.title: Leaking.
customer_reviews.text: One or more of the candles I received are leaking which seems very dangerous considering the flammable nature of the product. These are intended for an emergency kit but I don’t feel comfortable storing these.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Deutsch

customer_reviews.title: I must have for emergencies
customer_reviews.text: I must have for emergencies When the power goes out or camping
customer_reviews.author: Donald Wright

customer_reviews.title: Nice emergency candles
customer_reviews.text: I got these for emergencies. Used them a couple times when the power has gone out during a storm. They light easily, and have been safe in storage. I would expect them to last as long as they advertise.
customer_reviews.author: mikeE

customer_reviews.title: They are very stable and this is important in the emergency situations I see myself using them.
customer_reviews.text: The shape and type of container makes them ideal for emergency situations which is what i purchased them for. Flashlights and lanterns will eventually go out. The last time we went without power for 8 days. We were down to using candles and the ones we had didn't last or put out the amount of light we needed. The 100 hour candles will cover that for us.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting emergency candles... I keep one ...
customer_reviews.text: Long lasting emergency candles...I keep one in each car and I bought them as gifts for all my friends. They sell a little plastic shade to cover th flame for very inexpensive price (less than $5.00)
customer_reviews.author: Julez

customer_reviews.title: Mmm
customer_reviews.text: Showed up unmarked. Some were filled more than others although no apparent leaking. Not sure it's worth the cost yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tested them out and they do burn a long time and provide a good amount of light
customer_reviews.text: Needed candles for my home and our emergency kit. Tested them out and they do burn a long time and provide a good amount of light. Must have!
customer_reviews.author: Dakirch

customer_reviews.title: These seem to light well, as others have said ...
customer_reviews.text: These seem to light well, as others have said gotta raise the wick a little to get any decent amount of light thus making it less than 100 hours I would imagine. Anyway, I'll write more after I have an emergency and use them!
customer_reviews.author: moseng

customer_reviews.title: These are great when electricity is knocked out with storms
customer_reviews.text: These are great when electricity is knocked out with storms. Much better than candles and easy to keep in the cabinet for future use.
customer_reviews.author: Gil

customer_reviews.title: Good for intended use, exactly as described here.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for emergency use during power outages and such and they seem excellent for that purpose. Liquid paraffin makes a good smokeless fuel and they give out an adequate amount of light (maybe a little brighter than a regular candle). They are in plastic "bottles" so won't break if dropped. Seem to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bron

customer_reviews.title: Great, considering...
customer_reviews.text: I received the package and one of the candles had leaked out, and onto the shipping box. They arrived laying sideways in the package, but otherwise they work just fine, except the leaky one. I'll have to wait til the fluid evaporates. Great price for 600 hours of light tho.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Very Practical
customer_reviews.text: They were bigger than I thought, and I like the way you can adjust the flame by pulling out the wick. Not to mention the fact that you're not breathing in all that smoke!
customer_reviews.author: gloria

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great in an emergency!!!! No by-fuel smell and works well. Happy with product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Clara

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: They were packaged s***ty and oil leaked all over my complete order . The box was soaked in oil
customer_reviews.author: Jill Rodwick

customer_reviews.title: As advertised and on time
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in time and as advertised. Not going to use until/if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I keep a stock pile of these for when the power goes out. They do just what they say they do, provide 100 hours of light when you need it. Odor free light that is worry free. Lights very easy and stores perfectly for when you need them.
customer_reviews.author: Kory T

customer_reviews.title: No identification label...
customer_reviews.text: On arrival, one was broken and leaked all over the box. Another one in the same shipment, didn't have a cap on, and it also was leaking all over. The cap wasn't even in the box! Where did it go? There was NO LABEL on these candles to identify what they were. Odd....not real pleased but I hope they work when I need them.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Oil had leak out on the paper that was around the candles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time in excellent shape. Tried one before storing away, works great. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Darrel Buck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: You can't go back to the airport and grab a parachute when the plane is about to crash.
customer_reviews.author: Budster

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So awesome!! Really heavy. Glad I am more prepared for our electricity going out now that I have these.
customer_reviews.author: aja

customer_reviews.title: Excellent items for a power outage
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely no odor, completely adjustable wicks, and they will keep forever. the price on these fluctuate like the dang stockmarket. it's amazing how the price jumps whenever the is a disaster somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R. Spfld IL.

customer_reviews.title: No seller response to issue.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe these candles are good, or maybe they are even candles: not sure because they arrived with no labels to tell anyone what they are. I've asked for labels two or three times but no response. I wanted to give these as gifts with bug out bags I'm making for family members, but now need to buy new candles from someone else and hoping they will have labels telling people exactly what they are.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Lane

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine and delivered quickly
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine and delivered quickly. I recommend pulling the wick out a little more to get a larger flame.
customer_reviews.author: J-Dot

customer_reviews.title: Good for power outages
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for power outages they work great just make sure you pull the wick up a bit before you light them otherwiise the flame is super small.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dean

customer_reviews.title: The flame burns pretty low, so I don't get a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: The flame burns pretty low, so I don't get a lot of light from them, but it's better than nothing since we live in a high typhoon area.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marshall

customer_reviews.title: The candles arrived in good condition, one of the boxes had some stain ...
customer_reviews.text: The candles arrived in good condition, one of the boxes had some stain from a leakage but I couldn't detect that any of the candles in that box had been leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Marlin Ames

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: product as described with no issues on delivery as promised
customer_reviews.author: Duanne Bohne

customer_reviews.title: Works like I thought
customer_reviews.text: Open box. Light candle. Blow candle out. Sit on shelf for years.
customer_reviews.author: D. Garner

customer_reviews.title: EMERGENCY CANDLE
customer_reviews.text: They are what they claim them to be keep that in mind and it is a good product. my test unit has burned for over 109 hours and still has fuel left in it , so I am more than happy .

customer_reviews.title: They don't work when it gets cold...
customer_reviews.text: The liquid fuel in them freezes and the candle goes out, I'm guessing this happens at about 25 degrees or so.
customer_reviews.author: NJBuyer2

customer_reviews.title: lots of light
customer_reviews.text: These were Awesome! They showed up just in time. excellent buy, I lit them all as soon as I got them, after I started my stop watch. They all lasted over 100 hours one of them lasted 112 hours, I was absolutely amazed! Thank you EE.
customer_reviews.author: PyFam

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for Hurricane season and power outages in Hawaii. ...
customer_reviews.text: Ideal for Hurricane season and power outages in Hawaii. It's liquid so have to be careful where and how you store them.
customer_reviews.author: alohatees

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for my deck - better than candles or anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's okay...
customer_reviews.text: The candles are really cool and work as advertised, luckily I have not had to test them. Unfortunately for me I found a video on line that shows you how to DIY these candles with paraffin oil and mason jars. So if your not the DIY type, get these, but if you are looking to save and explore your options, do some research first.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Montanez

customer_reviews.title: It looks just like the advertisement
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this item yet. It looks just like the advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Use in a remote home in the mountains in case solar power goes down. Thanks. Wally
customer_reviews.author: Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Kind of dim
customer_reviews.text: These aren't too bright compared to a conventional candle. It doesn't seem I can pull out the wick any. I put this box in the basement for emergencies, but I'll keep looking for something that can light up a room better during power outages. Seems like a decent value for the clean and durable candles, but wish it burned brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Mike F

customer_reviews.title: ZYou need these
customer_reviews.text: Everyone should have at least some of these in storage. I lived through the great north east blackout back a few years ago. The power suddenly went out in the entire northeast and stayed out for 3 days! No light, no running water, using pool water in buckets to flush, no fresh food, it was a lesson I learned the hard way. I now keep supplies for a week survival...
customer_reviews.author: Carl G. Shea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received in great shape just what I wanted! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley J. Conklin

customer_reviews.title: Good packaging
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was good, no spills very neat. The product came fast as promised, the cost was good the shipping was fat.
customer_reviews.author: Nefer Ankhre

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, Arrived leaking and did not accept a return. Out the price and nothing to show for it.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Cummins

customer_reviews.title: Should fit the bill for emergency lighting
customer_reviews.text: Note that if you don't store them correctly they will leak. The seller didn't pack them very well so there was some leakage. Just takes a little cleanup is all. I haven't tested my set, but friends recommended these to me based off of use camping and even during recovery from a Tornado.
customer_reviews.author: C.Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: Great for bug out bags and camping bags and emergency situations where you would need it. You cant go wrong with it, great price and great peace of mind. Remember you cant order it when you will need it the most. Order it now and be prepared!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Candles
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as promised and shipped promptly. They are just emergency lighting for loss of electricity or power that will burn longer than a traditional candle. So good to have on hand during power outages, etc.
customer_reviews.author: baw53

customer_reviews.title: Good Emergency Candle
customer_reviews.text: These candles could be great for a power outage, but don't count on them providing a bunch of heat. I was able to adjust the wick to raise the flame height. I'm definitely going to order some more!!!
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to camping supplies, prepper,or for someone who just wants a lighting source when your power goes out
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They are great to have around for that OH SH!T moment or to be prepared! Highly recommend these for a prepper or for anyone just looking to have some long term lighting needs in case power goes out!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great price and they shipped well. I am looking forward to actually finding out if the burn 100 hours. They came without leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Tarrin P. Lupo

customer_reviews.title: Ready when I need them
customer_reviews.text: If the power is out for any length of time, it is good to know I won't have to rely on batteries and small lamps. These candles can be spread around a room to provide an even light, which can be easily cloaked from the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Xracer550

customer_reviews.title: I keep these stocked up
customer_reviews.text: Decent candles, and can't hurt to have a couple extra pack lying around in storage at the house. These are our back up candles in case we lose power or things go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Beautiful Beard

customer_reviews.title: Hopeful
customer_reviews.text: Hope these work. I bought a set for emergencies and it would be a shame if they don't actually last as long as advertised. I was surprised to find that they weren't glass bottles. I'm actually happy they weren't!
customer_reviews.author: Sean M.

customer_reviews.title: and put out nice “candle” light
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the previous reviewers, that they are smaller than they look in the photos. They work, and put out nice “candle” light. Not sure if they last a 100 hours or not, but happy with the purchase none-the-less.
customer_reviews.author: NM Flash

customer_reviews.title: No label or description on anything
customer_reviews.text: No label or description on anything, bad if for emergency prep.
customer_reviews.author: N Herman

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used them yet??!!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used these yet but they look just like they do in the picture. If they don't work when I go to light them during Armegeddon, I'll post that on this review!
customer_reviews.author: S. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful and a must have in every household! I will buy this product again. A+++++ Why do I have to type so many words??
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Thompson

customer_reviews.title: perfect for what we want
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for emergency purposes, especially since they are 100 hour plus rated. That being said we haven't used them. I just wish we had them last December when we had our first snow blizzard in like 22 months. Now we are ready for the next emergency!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Amos

customer_reviews.title: as expected
customer_reviews.text: Good candles. The box they came in had some of the oil spilt in it but I couldn't tell where it came from, all of the candles seemed intact but I sure it came from one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Newman

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Candles
customer_reviews.text: Product was as shown. Arrived in a great sturdy box. We've used these when the power has gone out due to snow or storms. They work great. Easy to store and use.
customer_reviews.author: aero_fun

customer_reviews.title: 100 Hour Plus Emergency Candle
customer_reviews.text: Everybody should have a set of these emergency candles in their house, just in case... 6 candles are more than enough for most emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: Ynotm8

customer_reviews.title: good for Emergency kit
customer_reviews.text: Helps to put together an emergency survival kit in earthquake state of California. Plus the price was right and shipping was quick.
customer_reviews.author: DeeJay

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: And Very Usefull Here on The Ranch, Once Used on an Evening of a Romantic Dinner and There was No Smell or Soot. I'm Very Pleased With My Purchase and Have Gifted Many Friends With Them as Well. Again Thank You AMAZON PRIME !
customer_reviews.author: GREAT Dane Bolster

customer_reviews.title: I would like to have labels or information that says how these ...
customer_reviews.text: The candles didn't have any packaging information or labels on them. I would like to have labels or information that says how these should be used or any considerations for safety, best practices, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Annalece

product_meta.title: Sterno 115 Hour Plus Emergency Paraffin Candle Clear Mist (6 Pack)
product_meta.description:
Thoughtful neighbor, friend, or family gift 
Everyday uses 
Relaxing for kids in a blackout 
Definite home emergency item 
Packaged with a plastic storage cap, so you won't have to worry about messy spills
feature_bullets: Set of 6 emergency candles - each lasts 115 hours!
